vulkanmod.options.advCulling.tooltip: Uze a culling algoritim dat mite improov purformans by reducin teh numbr ov non-vizibl chunk sekshuns rendrd.
vulkanmod.options.ao.subBlock.tooltip: ON (Sub-blok): Enablz smoov liting fur non full blok (xperimentul).
vulkanmod.options.entityCulling.tooltip: Enablz culling fur entiteez on not vizibl sekshuns.
vulkanmod.options.frameQueue.tooltip: Hi-yur valuze mite halp stabiliz fraymtyme but will increez inpooot lag.
vulkanmod.options.indirectDraw.tooltip: Reducez CPU ovurhed but increez GPU ovurhed. Enablin it mite halp in CPU limitd sistums.
vulkanmod.options.uniqueOpaqueLayer.tool: Uze a yunik rendur layr fur opaque terayn to improov purformans. It changiz sum distunt bloks aspekt
vulkanmod.options.enablePostEffect.toolt: Enablz Post Effek 'e.g. Glowin Effek, etc...'. Disablin dis may improov purformans!
vulkanmod.options.fixPostEffectBug.toolt: Fixiz few bugz wif Post-Effek espeshully when usin ASR but Post-effek still rendurz weerd if ASR iz enabld. Restartin teh game iz reqwire'd to tayk effek!
vulkanmod.options.animations.tooltip: Makz teh animate'd teksturz to animate. Disablin dis preventz dem frum animatin an may improov purformans a bit.
vulkanmod.options.renderSky.tooltip: Rendurrz teh sky. Disablin dis may improov purformans a bit.
vulkanmod.options.renderFog.tooltip: Rendurrz teh fog. Disablin dis may improov purformans a bit.
vulkanmod.options.renderEntityOutline.to: Rendurrz Wite Entitee Outlyn on entitee when affekted by glowin effek. Disablin dis may improov purformans.
Reqwirez §cEnabl Post-Effek§r opshun to be enabld
vulkanmod.options.perRenderTypeAreaBuffe:
(WARNIN: XPERIMENTUL)

Potenshully improovz purformans ov Chunk Rendurrin.

Very Arkiteckshur spesifik: May hav no effek on sum Devices
vulkanmod.options.excludeSampledUsage.to: When enabld, dis opshun optimiziz teh imaj solee fur rendurrin opshunz, enhansin effishunsee, an avoidin potenshul kompresseeon ishuz, partikularly on mowbile platformz. Howevur, it restriktz teh imaj to bein solee a rendurr target, thuz prohibitin direkt samplin in shaderz.
vulkanmod.options.swapchainImages.toolti: Setz teh numbur of Swapchain imajz. Optimized automatickally fur best purformans. Dis can be reduce'd to minimyz inpooot lag but at teh cost of decreezd FPS.
vulkanmod.options.showPhoneRAMInfo.toolt: Showz ur Fone RAM Info on debugg skreen.
vulkanmod.options.phoneRAMInfoUpdateDela: Setz teh numbur of sekundz when teh RAM info updayts info. Settin too low can affekt purformans.
vulkanmod.options.showPojavInfo.tooltip: Showz Pojav Info on debugg skreen.
vulkanmod.options.showLowRAM.tooltip: Sho Warnin wen yur RAM iz low
